堵.definition: to block up (a road, pipe etc); to stop up (a hole); (fig.) (of a person) choked up with anxiety or stress; wall (literary); (classifier for walls)

堵床上.definition: (coll.) to catch an adulterous couple in the act

堵截.definition: to intercept; to block the passage of; to interdict

堵死.definition: to block (a road); to plug (a hole); to stop up

堵車.definition: traffic jam; (of traffic) to get congested
